Dev_projects.title: Reservia
Dev_projects.desc: A hotel reservation web platform. The objective was to reproduce a mock-up using HTML and CSS for the 1st time.

Dev_projects.title: OhMyFood
Dev_projects.desc: A mobile focused website to order food from a selection of restaurants. The objective was to reproduce a mock-up using Sass for the 1st time and with a focus on CSS animations.

Dev_projects.title: GameOn
Dev_projects.desc: A landing page for a gaming event with a Sign-up modal form. The objective was to add some functionnalities to an existing web-page using JavaScript for the 1st time.

Dev_projects.title: FishEye
Dev_projects.desc: An accessible website to browse and contact freelancing photographers. The objective was to reproduce a mock-up using Bootstrap for the 1st time.

Dev_projects.title: Les-Petits-Plats
Dev_projects.desc: A search engine tool for a recipe database. The objectives were to write down a technical investigation sheet on the search functionalityand to code and compare the performance of different algorithms.

Dev_projects.title: Billed
Dev_projects.desc: An internal bill management tool. The objectives were to debug the existing code, add unit and integration tests and finally write a E2E test plan

Dev_projects.title: Kasa
Dev_projects.desc: An accomodation rental web platform. The objective was to reproduce a mock-up using React and React router for the 1st time.

Eng_projects.title: Car tire OCR
Eng_projects.desc: An optical character recognition application on 3D images of car tires

Eng_projects.title: Virtual production line
Eng_projects.desc: A 3-level monitoring application for a simulated production line
